item.title: ORCL
item.description: score:39 Chances: Tech stocks, including Oracle, are expected to be dominant in 2024 Major investments in AI across business models signal a potential paradigm shift The start of the fourth industrial revolution could benefit companies like Oracle Risks: The chip sector may see increased M&A activity, which poses both opportunities and risks for investors The AI market is still evolving, and companies like Oracle may face increasing competition Score:39 chances characters count - risks characters count = 39
